channel.title: SNG on Quiet time notes
channel.description: Recent content in SNG on Quiet time notes

item.title: SNG 7
item.description: SNG 7:3 vivid description of the bride from the feet to the head Related verses: Song of Solomon 7:1-8. See notes

item.title: SNG 2
item.description: SNG 2:5 Lord let me be sick for your love. let me become addicted to your love. They say love us blind, blind me to everything but you Jesus. May I be possessed with your being. overcome my desire for anything but you Related verses: Song of Solomon 2:5. See notes SNG 2:2 Jesus my lily among the thorns. the one that blossoms when everything around is dead. the one who shines in the dark.

item.title: SNG 1
item.description: SNG 1:12 Either Mary Magdalene knew what she was doing or was moved by the Holy Spirit to do it but Jesus knew it was something that needed to be done. She spent almost a year worth of wages to purchase the perfume. That probably was her savings. ?To whom much is forgiven, the same loves much? When I realise how much I?ve been forgiven, it will help me love God even more.

item.title: SNG 8
item.description: SNG 8:5 Solomon was born under an apple tree by Bathsheba Related verses: SONG OF SOLOMON 8:5. See notes
